languages.text: "Трон побери, старик, где ты взял эту дрянь? Капсулы с подобными ядами популярны у отчаянных ашмагов, не желающих терпеть пытки безумных святош или кого похуже. Но здесь, на Янусе... противоядия не найти".

"Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."
languages.original_text: "Трон побери, старик, где ты взял эту дрянь? Капсулы с подобными ядами популярны у отчаянных ашмагов, не желающих терпеть пытки безумных святош или кого похуже. Но здесь, на Янусе... противоядия не найти".

traits.locale_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Capsules with poisons of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

"Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

languages.text: 「クソっ、おいオッサン、これをどこで手に入れた？この種の毒カプセルは、狂信者に拷問されたり、それ以上に苦しむことに耐え切れなくなった絶望的なクズたちの間においてよくある選択肢だ。ただし、ヤヌスには…解毒剤はない」
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: 「クソっ、おいオッサン、これをどこで手に入れた？この種の毒カプセルは、狂信者に拷問されたり、それ以上に苦しむことに耐え切れなくなった絶望的なクズたちの間においてよくある選択肢だ。ただし、Janusには…解毒剤はない」

languages.text: « Que le Trône vous maudisse, vieillard ! Où avez-vous trouvé ceci ? Ces capsules de poison sont populaires auprès des ashmags désespérés qui ne supportent plus d'être torturés par des fanatiques ou pires. Mais ici, sur Janus... il n'y a pas d'antidote. »
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: « Que le Trône vous maudisse, vieillard ! Où avez-vous trouvé ceci ? Ces capsules de poison sont populaires auprès des ashmags désespérés qui ne supportent plus d'être torturés par des fanatiques ou pires. Mais ici, sur Janus... il n'y a pas d'antidote. »

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，老家伙，你到底是从哪里搞到这种东西的？只有走投无路的坏种，生怕自己落到疯子手上遭到非人的折磨，才会吃下这样的毒胶囊。在加努斯……这种毒药根本无药可解。”
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，老家伙，你到底是从哪里搞到这种东西的？只有走投无路的坏家伙，生怕自己落到疯子手上遭到非人的折磨，才会吃下这样的毒胶囊。在加努斯……这种毒药根本无药可解。”

languages.text: «Por el Trono, carcamal, ¿de dónde ha sacado esto? Esta clase de cápsulas tóxicas la suelen utilizar los ashmag desesperados que no pueden soportar más torturas de fanáticos y demás calaña. Aunque aquí en Janus... antídoto no hay».
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: «Por el Trono, carcamal, ¿de dónde ha sacado esto? Esta clase de cápsulas tóxicas la suelen utilizar los ashmag desesperados que no pueden soportar más torturas de fanáticos y demás calaña. Aunque aquí en Janus... antídoto no hay».

languages.text: "Der Thron verdamme Euch, alter Mann, woher habt Ihr das? Solche Giftkapseln sind sehr beliebt bei verzweifelten Ashmags, die es leid sind, von wahnsinnigen Fanatikern gefoltert zu werden ... oder Schlimmeres. Aber hier auf Janus ... gibt es kein Gegengift."
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: "Der Thron verdamme Euch, alter Mann, woher habt Ihr das? Solche Giftkapseln sind sehr beliebt bei verzweifelten Ashmags, die es leid sind, von wahnsinnigen Fanatikern gefoltert zu werden ... oder Schlimmeres. Aber hier auf Janus ... gibt es kein Gegengift."

languages.text: "Taht seni kahretsin ihtiyar, nereden buldun bu şeyi? Bu tip zehir kapsülleri, aslen delirmiş fanatikler veya daha kötülerinin işkencelerine maruz kalan umutsuz külboğazlarca tercih edilir. Burada, yani Janus'ta panzehiri bulunmaz."
languages.original_text: "Throne damn you, old man, where did you get this stuff? Poison capsules of this sort are a popular choice among desperate ashmags who are done with being tortured by mad fanatics or worse. Here on Janus, though... there's no antidote."

traits.locale_text: "Taht seni kahretsin ihtiyar, nereden buldun bu şeyi? Bu tip zehir kapsülleri, aslen delirmiş fanatikler veya daha kötülerinin işkencelerine maruz kalan umutsuz külboğazlarca tercih edilir. Burada, yani Janus'ta panzehiri bulunmaz."
